mapper.select: SELECT cbc.cb_brand, cbcb.cb_domestic,cbcb.cb_englishlan,cbcb.cb_korealan,cbcb.cb_photo,cbc.count FROM (SELECT cb.cb_brand, COUNT(c.c_num) count FROM KCAR_CARBRAND cb LEFT JOIN KCAR_CAR c ON cb.cb_brand = c.cb_brand WHERE cb.cb_domestic='해외' GROUP BY cb.cb_brand ORDER BY cb.cb_brand ) cbc LEFT JOIN kcar_carbrand cbcb ON cbcb.cb_brand = cbc.cb_brand
SELECT c.*, ct.* FROM KCAR_CAR c FULL OUTER JOIN KCAR_CAR_TAG ct ON c.c_num = ct.c_num WHERE c.cb_brand=#{brand}
SELECT cb_m_model FROM KCAR_CARBRAND_MODEL WHERE cb_brand=#{brand}
SELECT cb.cb_m_model, count(c.c_num) count FROM KCAR_CARBRAND_MODEL cb LEFT JOIN KCAR_CAR c on cb.cb_m_model = c.cb_m_model WHERE cb.cb_brand = #{brand} GROUP BY cb.cb_m_model ORDER BY cb.cb_m_model
